title: Whirlpool 292 L Frost Free Double Door 3 Star Refrigerator  (Alpha Steel, IF 305 ELT ALPHA STEEL(3S))

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Refrigerator
User Manual and Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Performance Features: Fresh Flow Air System: Fresh Flow Air Tower, Fresh Flow Flexi-vents with Anti Bacterial Filters and Active Deo
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: 7 Days Garden Fresh Vegetable and Fruit Crisper with Freshonizer & Mini Tray, Multi Utility Box, Orchard Fresh Fruit Crisper, Everyday Fresh, Chilling Gel, Microblock in Fruit and Vegetable Crisper and Ice Twister & Collector
product_specification.Technology Used: 6th Sense Intellifresh Technology with Deep Freeze, Hexafresh Moisture Lock Technology
product_specification.Installation & Demo:
Explain all the functionality of the product
Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from an brand authorized service engineer
Usage of the product
The authorized service engineer will be providing detailed demo that includes
The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost. All additional accessories not part of the the package will be charged separately
Preventive maintenance action to be taken
Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Whirlpool
product_specification.Covered in Warranty:
Against Defective Material and Workmanship
All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Any accessories external to the product
Defects caused by improper use as determined by the company personnel
Serial number is removed, altered or obliterated from the machine
Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube
Site (where the premises is kept) conditions that do not confirm to the recommended operating conditions of the machine
Product is not used according to the instructions given in the instructions manual
Modification or alteration of any nature made in the electrical circuitry or physical construction of the set
Defects due to cause beyond control like lightening, abnormal voltage, acts of god or while in transit to the service centers or purchasers residence.

product_description.Intelligent Refrigerator (AI Microproces: The Adaptive Intelligence (AI) Microprocessor analyses data and optimizes the level of cooling accordingly. The refrigerator also senses the Load, Weather Conditions, and Usage Patterns with the help of the 3 IntelliSensors to ensure long-lasting freshness.
product_description.Freshflow Air Tower with Flexi Vents: Your food will retain its freshness for longer thanks to this refrigerator's scientifically designed Air Tower. It also has strategically placed vents that pass cool air across different areas of the refrigerator to ensure uniformity while cooling.

review:
Excellent Refrigerator ...
Genuine Review

I bought this during the sale. Very Good Storage capacity with awesome looks for a economy price.

No light in the freezer is the only drawback.

Very pleased with the purchase. Flipkart was right on time with delivery. Everything from delivery to pick up of our old refrigerator was hassle free. On top of it, getting a Whirlpool Refrigerator at this price was a killer deal. All in all, it was an awesome Republic Day...🤗

Whirlpool Neo is very good model and look wise also good, few thing like to share with you all. Fridge is stabilizer free operation and it operates from 135v - 290v. Whirlpool technician insisted to buy the stabilizer and if the circuit got faulty means they will charge 3000rs and it doesnt cover warranty itseems.
previously i have LG single door 180l fridge and its very good stabilizer free option and it was running more than 15 years without stabilizer and doesnt have fault except the bulb inside the fridge got fused and for the exchange offer i have bought whirlpool neo. capacity is 292 liter and storage space is 265 liter.

Pros:
Fridge design and technology wise is good.
The outlet drain water will get evaporate and no need to check the drain tray at the bottom.
Cons:
Slightly heating issues at the sides due to condenser is placed inside and also mentioned that is for humidity control.
If the fridge is stabilizer free operations why it requires additional stabilizer and that fault also not covered under warranty it seems.

Will check the durability and will post another review later...
Nice built. Space efficient. Best in this category. Just one problem. The cord is too short and also the machinery at lower back is wide open. No protection from rodents. Using it since 3 months.

About Flipkart Process :

I have order the product on sunday @ 4.51 PM and got confirmation from flipkart @ 5.30 PM as my order is shipped.
I appreciate team flipkart for very quick processing.

About Ekart Logistics Service :

I have scheduled the delivery for Monday (i.e. Next day of order place) between 9AM-2PM. I got sms at 8.30AM as my order is out for delivery, and also got confirmation call from delivery person, as he may be reaching at my location till 9.30AM and he was at my place @9.15AM. Good timing and also he has satisfying to me to check the product thoroughly.

About Whirlpool Product :

I have done many research on double door frige, taken about 10-15 model & brand review, I found Whirlpool is the best one with technology and pricing. I have choose this product as per my future requirement and Whirlpool made my dreams come true..

Thanks Team Whirlpool for producing such a great product.

Looks good and performance was good but inbuilt stabilization is very poor. 4 parts were gone just in 6 months of purchase. Whirlpool customer service is one of the worst I have ever seen till today. Don't expect good service from company side. Refrigerator is good but use with stabilizer.

Im writing this about half a year after purchase of the refrigerator as my ratings show it is very goid in this price range. Space is good enough for family of 7-10 people, in this one youll find more trays as i searched a lot before buying this and realised many variant have only 2 trays in this one we have 3 trays which is awesome. a special tray for fruits which is good. however this one little less wider than above 300 lts ones but good as it is taller. so my ratings are 5 star as in this price range and features you get for whirlphool like 6th sense cooling tech means it has auto function which can set based on room temp automatically which is ver good. if you have any doubt i would recommend to go for youtube about this ine and have a look on video that would give you better idea. also but from Flipkart the price they are offerring is way to good comparing with dealers if you go buy yourself. filpkart is very good they gave it to me intact on time delivery without any issues so 5 star to Flipkart fron me for this Whirlphool Regrigerator.

A nice product but little costly.. you can get same features from LG and other company in this price range, even cheaper also.. But whirlpool quality is awesome.. hight and storage of fride is more enough for 3-4 member family.
Loved it! Cooling is good so far. Loved the interior compartnents of it, I can keep food so well organized!
Happy with the product, product quality and flipkart service. Product was delivered pretty fast. My overall experience is Excellent with the services and product both. Thank you Flipkkart. :)

Excellent Refrigerator ...
Genuine Review

questions: Q:what is reciprocratory compressure?
Q:it has yellow light or white colour light ?
Q:any one tell me is there door cooling available in this fridge
Q:Is backside fully closed?
Q:Is this a convertible refrigerator?
Q:How much electricity energy consume per year?
Q:is this intellifresh or neo fresh. Please Confirm. Image is showing neo fresh
Q:does this refrigerator come with stand to place the fridge ??
Q:Can't decide what size of fridge is fit for me. How do I decide on the capacity that is ideal for me?
Q:Height & width of said product ?
Q:Can large vessels be accommodated on the toughened glass shelves?
Q:How much space does the refrigerator require around it?
Q:is if Neo or is it Intellifresh? because IF 305 model is Intellifresh. please confirm
Q:is stand require in this?
Q:Does it require a Stabilizer?
Q:How can I keep my fridge odour-free and fresh at all times?
Q:What is the energy star rating of this refrigerator?
Q:can we use Bajaj card?
Q:is door lock is there in this refrigerator?
Q:which is better reciprocatory compressor and inverter linear compressor.
Q:can we use refrigerator without demo or install by ourself?
Q:how much height is it?
Q:How many eggs can b stored in the tray ?
answers: A:in receprocatory compressor that on/off automatically accordance to temperature ... in digi inverter compressor it slow/fast automatically accordance to temprature ...
A:there is no door cooling, however things kept in door portion get cools due to convection cooling
A:yes the back side is fully closed
A:40-80L: Ideal for Bachelors or as bedroom fridge, 80-240L: Ideal for Couples and Small families, 240-400L: Ideal for Family of 4 to 5, 400L and Above: Good for Large Families
A:Height 5 ft 7inches, width 2 ft around , Depth 2 ft 2 inches
A:Yes. If you're looking to fit large vessels on the shelves, you can do so by adjusting the height of the toughened glass shelves.
A:In order to have sufficient ventilation, the refrigerator should have at least 10.2 cm space on all the sides. It should also have 10.2 cm between the wall facing the back of the refrigerator.
A:It does not require a stabilizer since it comes with an voltage fluctuation safe internal circuitary. However, if you face frequent voltage fluctuations, an external stabilizer is recommended.
A:This refrigerator has Active Deo technology which keeps the refrigerator environment fresh and odour-free
A:This is a 3 Star rated refrigerator, giving you Energy Savings of upto 30% approximately.
